page.title: 09MORFA BYCHAN GOLF CLUB
page.content: The Porthmadog and Borth y Gest Golf Club is situated in Morfa Bychan.It originated with a 9-hole course in 1905.It was soon extended to 18 holes to the design of James Braid.Few of the present holes conform with Braid's original design.Difficulties have arisen through erosion on the estuary side.Today it is a well laid-out course where the turf has a sandy subsoil making for light texture.The greens and fairways are well kept by a team of groundsmen.Some of the holes are played over rough country with marvellous views over mountains and sea,which make the course so interesting and competitive.
